info.name: mb]wassr検索
info.description:
Wassr検索のCSSです。
http://labs.ceek.jp/wassr/

カラムに交互に色をつけて、マウスポインタが行にくると色を変えて自分なりに読みやすくしました。

web
http://my.opera.com/momizine/
twitter
http://twitter.com/momizine
wassr
http://wassr.jp/user/momizin

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document url-prefix(http://labs.ceek.jp/wassr/){
/* CSS Document */
/*
===== CSS Information ====================================

Name         Wassræ¤œç´¢ã€€http://twitter.1x1.jp/search/
creat        2008/07/25 - momizine
lastupdate   2008/07/25 - momizine
Ver          1.0
location     http://my.opera.com/momizine/

æ›´æ–°å±¥æ­´
Ver 1.0ï¼šåˆç‰ˆ

==========================================================
*/
tr,
tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr{
 background-color:#eee;
}

tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr{

 background-color:#fff;
}

tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover{
 background-color:#f1f2c4;
}

tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover,
tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr+tr:hover{
 background-color:#ffffc0;
}

}
